original_title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Red Fox Festival
overview: Babymetal's second stop in their Five Fox Festival in Japan tour. In this July 19, 2017 performance at Akasaka Blitz (赤坂BLITZ) in Minato, Tokyo, Babymetal showcases their groundbreaking fusion of heavy metal, J-pop, and dance. This was a special fan event with attendance restricted to females.
tagline: The magnificent dance of the red Megitsune knights…
title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Red Fox Festival
